info.name: Dub.dj
info.description: A clean, flat and minimal theme for Dubtrack.fm - It removes a lot of unwanted features like the Share Buttons, Makes the Chat and Video look a lot better too!
info.additionalInfo:
Video Preview: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DRHncg4tZoU

Miku-Plugin must be Removed & Blank/Remove DubX's Custom CSS.
Custom Background Plugin's aren't supported. No change will take effect if you use a Custom Background.
It will have Black Bars around the sides if you don't have a 1080p Screen with Chrome Maximized and the Bookmarks Menu open.
